pageProps.title: 7 Benefit of Magnesium for Human Body : Surprising fact of Magnesium
pageProps.metaDesc:
Magnesium is an enthralling mineral. It participates in over 350 different enzymes in the body, and we may discover that it participates in many more. What's fascinating about enzymes is that they accelerate chemical reactions in the body by a factor of 100 million times faster than if you didn't have that enzyme.

So they're catalysts, or things that help the chemical reaction happen much faster. What's even more amazing about enzymes is that they don't run out of energy. So they're a little magical in that they appear to have their own energy that doesn't seem to run out.
